program codeforces_8_B

implicit none

character(len=100) :: s

integer :: x=0, y=0, k=0, len_s, dx=0, dy=0, i,j 

integer, dimension(2,0:100) :: co

logical :: flag = .true.

! Initialize the starting position

co(1,0) =0

co(2,0) =0

k=1  ! initial k after first increment in java (previously, in Java initial was 0 then k becomes 1)

read(*,'(A)') s

len_s = len_trim(s)

do i =1, len_s

    select case ( s(i:i) )

    case ('L')

        x = x -1

    case ('R')

        x = x +1

    case ('U')

        y = y +1

    case ('D')

        y = y -1

    end select

    co(1,k) = x

    co(2,k) = y

    k = k + 1

end do

! Now check for any i and j with distance >=3 indices and close coordinates.

outerloop : do i =0, k-4

    do j =i +3, k-1

        dx = co(1,i) - co(1,j)

        dx = abs(dx)

        dy = co(2,i) - co(2,j)

        dy = abs(dy)

        if ( ( (dx <=1 .and. dy ==0) .or. &

             (dy <=1 .and. dx ==0) ) ) then

            flag = .false.

            exit outerloop

        endif

    end do

end do outerloop

if (flag) then

    print *, 'OK'

else

    print *, 'BUG'

end if

end program codeforces_8_B
